member.name: T:FM.WebSync.Core.JsonExtensions
member.summary: Collection of static extension methods that make it easier to serialize/deserialize JSON values.

member.name: M:FM.WebSync.Core.JsonExtensions.GetValue``1(FM.WebSync.Core.Extensions,System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes and returns a value serialized in the extensions.
member.typeparam: The type of the value serialized in the extensions.
member.param: The name used to retrieve the serialized value.
member.returns: The deserialized value.

member.name: M:FM.WebSync.Core.JsonExtensions.TryGetValue``1(FM.WebSync.Core.Extensions,System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Deserializes and returns a value serialized in the extensions.
member.typeparam: The type of the value serialized in the extensions.
member.param: The name used to retrieve the serialized value.
member.returns: true if the deserialization was successful; otherwise false.

member.summary: Serializes and stores a value in the extensions.

The value to serialize and store.

member.name: M:FM.WebSync.Core.JsonExtensions.Publish``1(FM.WebSync.Core.Publisher,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Synchronously sends a single publication.
member.remarks: This method always executes synchronously and returns the it automatically creates.
member.typeparam: The type of the data to publish.
member.param: The channel to which the data should be published.
member.returns: The sent publication.

member.name: T:FM.WebSync.Core.JSON
member.summary: Contains methods for serializing/deserializing DataContract-decorated classes.

member.name: M:FM.WebSync.Core.JSON.Serialize(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes an object marked with appropriate DataContract/DataMember attributes to a JSON string.
member.returns: The JSON representation of the object

member.name: M:FM.WebSync.Core.JSON.Serialize``1(``0)
member.summary: Serializes an object marked with appropriate DataContract/DataMember attributes to a JSON string.
member.typeparam: The type of item to serialize.
member.returns: The JSON representation of the object.

member.name: M:FM.WebSync.Core.JSON.Deserialize``1(System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes a JSON string to an object marked with appropriate DataContract/DataMember attributes.
member.returns: The deserialized object
